New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest century in ODI World Cup history (63 balls)
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored an unbeaten 131 off 100 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs
Hashmatullah Shahidi and Azmatullah Omarzai formed a 121-run partnership
Rahmat Shah fell to Shardul Thakur for 15 runs
Mohammad Nabi scored 19 runs off 27 balls
Hardik Pandya dismissed Azmatullah Omarzai for 28 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Rohit Sharma went past Sachin Tendulkar for most hundreds at the World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
Virat Kohli's innings was little more than batting practice
Miscellaneous Highlights: India maintained their unbeaten World Cup record against Afghanistan
Afghanistan's best passage of play would follow, with Shahidi and Omarzai compiling a 121-run partnership
